name: Power Raptors: Casper
description:
Jump around as the magical cat Casper in this simple 2D platformer demo!

Controls:
  • - Z / Space / Up Arrow = Jump
  • - F = Toggle Fullscreen
  • - Escape = Quit
  • - R = Restart

Made by Faybia (up945607), Dominic (up930824), Klaidas (up930223) and Cody (up935732)
